text: Evelyn Lee Marie Sampi (born 6 October 1988), known professionally as Everlyn Sampi, is an Australian actress. She is of Bardi Australian Aboriginal and Scottish descent. She starred in the 2002 film Rabbit-Proof Fence, and won the 4th Annual Lexus Inside Film Awards for Best Actress on 6 November 2002. Sampi appeared in the 2007 Australian drama The Circuit as the character Leonie. ==External links== * Official Site * Category:1988 births Category:Australian child actresses Category:Australian film actresses Category:Indigenous Australian actors Category:Indigenous Australians from Western Australia Category:Living people Category:Australian people of Scottish descent Category:People from Derby, Western Australia
title: Everlyn Sampi
